attribute-definition.description: This field allows you to customise the address in the HPP. True will load the billing_address fields in the page and false will hide it.
This field allows you to customise the address fileds validation in the HPP. True will make all billing_address fields mandatory in the page and false will make it optional.

attribute-definition.display-name: Inject Apple Pay Button on Cart Page?
Inject Apple Pay Button on Mini Cart?

attribute-definition.description: This field allows you to customise the card block in the HPP. True will load the card holder name in the page and false will hide it.
The 3-D Secure Directory Server transaction ID that is used for the 3D Authentication. Note: This field is required when 3ds 2.0 is used.
This field allows you to customise the alignment of the HPP. True will align in the horizontal and false will align in the vertical. And true is the default value.
Locale code - i.e - "en_GB" "en_US"
The label that overrides the business name in the PayPal account on the PayPal site.
The PayPal assigned ID for the payer.

attribute-definition.display-name: Email Associate with PayPal Merchant Account(optional)

attribute-definition.description: This field allows you to customise the order summary block in the HPP iframe. True will load the order summary in the page and false will hide it. Set to false, to hide hosted frame.

y = authentication successful, n = not authenticated, u = authentication unavailable, a = authentication attempted, r = authentication rejected
The 3-D Secure version used for the authentication.
Applied authentification mode: sca Strong authentication; frictionless Frictionless authentication;

3-D Secure out of scope reason. Shall be used if the transaction type is out of scope of Strong Customer Authentication (SCA). The following transaction types are out of scope of SCA: mit Merchant Initiated Transactions moto Mail Order/Telephone Order one_leg_out anonymous_prepaid_card
Applied authentification mode: sca Strong authentication; frictionless Frictionless authentication;
Card’s enrollment status.

3DS Requestor Challenge Indicator. Mandatory for CB. Acccepted values: sca ask for a strong authentication; frictionless ask for a frictionless authentication; nopref or absent, the decision will be made by Dalenys; scamandate strong authentication required by regulation
6 character value composed of 3DSECURESTATUS converted to hexadecimal concatenated with the result VRes converted to hexadecimal
The 3-D Secure Server transaction ID that is used for the 3-D Secure version 2 Authentication.
CB scoring. Mandatory for CB transactions.
Enroll a given transaction for 3D-secure to verify whether authentication is supported for the card being used
3-D Secure “Cardholder Authentication Verification Value” algorithm(0-9).
3-D Secure X id.
3-D Secure “Cardholder Authentication Verification Value”.
The Electronic Commerce Indicator (ECI).
Whether to create a token or not for the card. Defaults to 'false'. Setting it to 'true' will create the token for the card.
This indicates the system whether to perform duplicate check on the transaction or not. A request is considered duplicate if the capture_reference has already been used within last 24 hours.
y = authentication successful, n = not authenticated, u = authentication unavailable, a = authentication attempted, r = authentication rejected
The 3-D Secure version used for the authentication.

3-D Secure out of scope reason. Shall be used if the transaction type is out of scope of Strong Customer Authentication (SCA). The following transaction types are out of scope of SCA: mit Merchant Initiated Transactions moto Mail Order/Telephone Order one_leg_out anonymous_prepaid_card
Applied authentification mode: sca Strong authentication; frictionless Frictionless authentication;
Card’s enrollment status.

3DS Requestor Challenge Indicator. Mandatory for CB. Acccepted values: sca ask for a strong authentication; frictionless ask for a frictionless authentication; nopref or absent, the decision will be made by Dalenys; scamandate strong authentication required by regulation
6 character value composed of 3DSECURESTATUS converted to hexadecimal concatenated with the result VRes converted to hexadecimal
The 3-D Secure Server transaction ID that is used for the 3-D Secure version 2 Authentication.
CB scoring. Mandatory for CB transactions.
Enroll a given transaction for 3D-secure to verify whether authentication is supported for the card being used
3-D Secure “Cardholder Authentication Verification Value” algorithm(0-9).
3-D Secure “Cardholder Authentication Verification Value”.
The Electronic Commerce Indicator (ECI).
This indicates the system whether to perform duplicate check on the transaction or not. A request is considered duplicate if the capture_reference has already been used within last 24 hours.

attribute-definition.display-name: Account Id's With Currency and Language Code.
attribute-definition.description: Example: "GB_GBP_AccountId". You can use it to have multiple accounts with currency code and country code.
